workflow.name: Automated appointment approval system with GPT-4 Mini, JotForm, and Telegram
workflow.description:
# AI Powered All Purpose Appointment System via JotForm

## What This Workflow Does

This template automates the entire appointment request lifecycle using AI. When someone submits an appointment request through JotForm, the system automatically sends details for approval, generates personalized confirmation or rejection emails using OpenAI, and maintains records‚Äîall without manual intervention.

üëâ [Get JotForm here](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=roshanramanidev)

Whether you're running a clinic, consulting business, training center, or any service-based operation, this workflow eliminates repetitive email writing and ensures consistent, professional communication. It's fully customizable to work with any appointment form structure.

## Who's It For

- Service providers (consultants, trainers, coaches)
- Healthcare professionals
- Educational institutions
- Salon and wellness businesses
- Event coordinators
- Any business handling appointment requests at scale

## How It Works

1. **Form Submission** ‚Äì Appointment request arrives via JotForm
2. **Data Extraction** ‚Äì System pulls name, email, phone, date, time, and visit type
3. **Approval Request** ‚Äì Details are sent to Telegram for review and approval
4. **AI Email Generation** ‚Äì OpenAI creates personalized confirmation or rejection email based on approval status
5. **Smart Routing** ‚Äì If approved: records in Google Sheets and sends confirmation. If rejected: removes from system and sends reschedule notice
6. **Automated Follow-up** ‚Äì Requester receives professional email instantly

## Getting Started (Quick Setup)

### Step 1: Choose Your JotForm
- Select any existing appointment form or create a new one in JotForm
- The workflow works with any form structure

### Step 2: Map Your Form Fields
- Identify the field names in your JotForm (name, email, phone, appointment date, time, etc.)
- Update the "Parse: Extract Appointment Details" node with your exact field names
- This ensures the workflow reads data correctly from your specific form

### Step 3: Follow Full Setup Steps
1. **Connect JotForm** ‚Äì Copy the Form ID and API Key
2. **Configure Google Sheets** ‚Äì Create a sheet for appointment records and copy the spreadsheet ID
3. **Setup Telegram** ‚Äì Create a bot via BotFather for approval notifications
4. **Add OpenAI Credentials** ‚Äì Generate an API key at platform.openai.com
5. **Authorize Gmail** ‚Äì Enable Gmail API in Google Cloud Console

### Why This Is Customizable

The workflow is built to be flexible from the start. Whether your form collects appointment type, service category, special requests, or any other field, you can easily map those fields into the flow. Just identify what data your form collects and tell the workflow where to find it.

## Requirements

- JotForm account with an appointment form
- Google Sheets for record keeping
- Telegram account and bot (for approvals)
- OpenAI API key (paid account recommended)
- Gmail account for sending emails
- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)

## How to Customize

- **Change Approval Channel** ‚Äì Replace Telegram with Slack, Discord, or email by swapping the notification node
- **Modify Email Templates** ‚Äì Edit the AI prompt in "Generate: Appointment Response Email" to match your tone and branding
- **Add More Fields** ‚Äì Update the Set node to capture additional information from your JotForm like appointment type, service category, or special requests
- **Adjust Routing Logic** ‚Äì Modify the conditional node to add approval stages or auto-confirm certain appointment types
- **Connect CRM** ‚Äì Add steps to automatically create contacts in HubSpot, Pipedrive, or Salesforce
- **Enable Reminders** ‚Äì Use Gmail or SMS nodes to send appointment reminders 24 hours before scheduled time
- **Extend Data Collection** ‚Äì Map any custom fields from your JotForm by updating the extraction node to include them

options.systemMessage:
=You are an Appointment Email Assistant for a Doctor's Office. Your job is to read appointment form data and the doctor's response, then generate the correct email to send to the patient. Your tasks: Extract patient details such as name, email, appointment date, and time from the form data. Check if the doctor's approval status (approved) is true or false. If approved = true, write a confirmation email confirming the appointment. If approved = false, write a polite reschedule or decline email, offering the patient to choose another time or contact the clinic. Always reply only in valid JSON format with exactly three fields: email ‚Üí patient's email address subject ‚Üí short and clear subject line html_body ‚Üí full HTML message with , ,

,

tags etc. Use a warm, professional, and caring tone. Assume the email will be sent via the Gmail tool, so you only need to provide the content ‚Äî not the sending logic. Example output when approved: { "email": "patient@example.com", "subject": "Appointment Confirmed - 16 Oct 2025, 9:00 AM", "html_body": "

Your Appointment is Confirmed

Dear Roshan Ramani,

Your appointment has been confirmed for 16 October 2025 at 9:00 AM. Please arrive 10 minutes early.

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Warm regards,
Doctor's Office

" } Example output when not approved: { "email": "patient@example.com", "subject": "Appointment Update - Rescheduling Required", "html_body": "

Appointment Update

Dear Roshan Ramani,

Unfortunately, your requested appointment on 16 October 2025 could not be approved.

Please contact us to reschedule at your convenience or choose another available slot.

Thank you for understanding.
Doctor's Office

" }

value.name: ={{ $('Parse: Extract Appointment Details').item.json.rawRequest.Name.first }} {{ $('Parse: Extract Appointment Details').item.json.rawRequest.Name.last }}
value.duration: ={{ $('Parse: Extract Appointment Details').item.json.rawRequest['Select an Appointment Date'].duration }}
value.date and time: ={{ $('Parse: Extract Appointment Details').item.json.rawRequest['Select an Appointment Date'].date }}

parameters.content:
#  AI Powered All Purpose Appointment System via JotForm

This workflow automates appointment requests by capturing form submissions, getting approval from a decision-maker, and sending appropriate confirmation or rejection emails.

**What It Does:**
- Captures new appointment requests from JotForm form
- Sends appointment details for review and approval
- Generates personalized confirmation or rejection emails using AI
- Records approved appointments in Google Sheets
- Handles both approvals and rejections automatically
---

üëâ [Get the JotForm](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=roshanramanidev)

**How It Works:**

1. **Appointment Request Form Trigger** - New form submission arrives
2. **Parse: Extract Appointment Details** - Pulls name, email, phone, date, time, visit type
3. **Notify for Approval or Decline** - Sends details to approval channel for review
4. **Generate: Appointment Response Email** - AI creates confirmation or reschedule email based on approval
5. **Condition: Check Approval Status** - Routes to approved or rejected path
   - **If Approved:**
     - Log: Record Appointment in sheets - Stores in Google Sheets
     - Send: Confirmation Email - Sends confirmation to requester
   - **If Rejected:**
     - Delete Rejected Appointment - Removes from form system
     - Send: Rejection or Reschedule Email - Notifies requester

**Key Benefits:**
- Fully automated with no manual email writing
- AI-powered personalized responses
- Clean record keeping in Google Sheets
- Instant approval/rejection notifications
- Professional communication maintained

---

user.name: Roshan Ramani
user.bio:
I love building smart n8n automations that actually work reliably.

 My focus is on making everyday tasks like email, social media, and CRM workflows simpler using AI.

I've shared templates in the n8n community, including a WhatsApp Expense Tracker that people really enjoy.
What keeps me excited is constantly trying new things - testing fresh nodes, playing with AI tools like LangChain, and discovering creative ways to connect systems!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
